abstract: As a parent, you imagine your children will adopt your excellent tastes, and it can be disheartening when they develop an enthusiasm for Hannah Montana or ''The Real Housewives of New Jersey'' (''Gilligan's Island'' was so much better).
snippet: As a parent, you imagine your children will adopt your excellent tastes, and it can be disheartening when they develop an enthusiasm for Hannah Montana or ''The Real Housewives of New Jersey'' (''Gilligan's Island'' was so much better).

headline.main: My Three Favorite Recommendations from My Teenage Daughter
